Comment: It's a good article.  Dakota State University is granting an honorary doctorate to Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, and she is giving a commencement speech.  Many students are opposed but are afraid to speak out (especially international students).  Some students fear for their future job prospects if they openly protest.
Author: aleph32

Comment: If those students really wanted to send a message, they'd withdraw from the university under protest
